name: spo-export-author-byline-users
title: Extract the employees shown on modern pages (Author byline) in a selection of Site Collections to CSV
shortDescription: Sample showing how to extract the employees shown on modern pages in a selection of Site Collections
longDescription: One of my customs requested that we removed a specific employee from the modern pages in their Intranet ASAP as that employee had left rather abruptly. They had no idea where that employee was displayed hence this script

thumbnails.alt: Preview image of the sample Extract the employees shown on modern pages ( Author byline )  in a selection of Site Collections to CSV

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
